thread.title: McCarthy Never Told Boehner He Would Drop Race
thread.title_full: McCarthy Never Told Boehner He Would Drop Race

author: Taegan Goddard
title: McCarthy Never Told Boehner He Would Drop Race
text:
McCarthy Never Told Boehner He Would Drop Race October 8, 2015 By Taegan Goddard 0 Comments 
House Speaker John Boehner “seemed to have no inkling on Thursday that his deputy, Rep. Kevin McCarthy, was preparing to withdraw from the speaker’s race,” the Cincinnati Enquirer reports. 
Said Boehner, a few minutes before the vote: “I’m confident he’ll win today and I’m confident he’ll win on Oct. 29.” 
“But even as he reflected on his 25-year congressional career and what he might do next, his House Republican conference was thrown into a fresh round of turmoil—one that might even delay the Ohio Republicans departure… Boehner immediately postponed the election, as he and his stunned colleagues scrambled to figure out their next move.” Related Posts Never miss a Political Wire post Your email address: * Please enter all required fields Correct invalid entries
